benchmark_details.name: Products-10K
benchmark_details.overview: Products-10K is a human-labeled product image dataset containing 10,000 fine-grained SKU-level products frequently bought by online customers in JD.com, aimed at improving the accuracy of product recognition systems.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a large, high-quality product recognition dataset for improving fine-grained image classification in retail and e-commerce applications.

data.source: Images collected from the online shopping website JD.com
data.annotation: Manually labeled by human experts, with at least three experts verifying each image.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy is calculated using the top-1 accuracy metric based on the predictions made on the test set.
methodology.interpretation: Higher top-1 accuracy indicates better performance in correctly identifying SKU-level products.
methodology.baseline_results: Top-1 accuracy has reached 64.12% after applying various model fine-tuning tricks.
methodology.validation: Validation was performed using a balanced subset of the training data to avoid class imbalance issues.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.data_licensing: Available for non-commercial research and educational purposes.
